tasks.label: SmartBuildClientOfOpenSSLQUICBugReproducer
tasks.command: cd openSSL/client && if [ ! -f debug/main ] || [ $(find . -name '*.c' -newer debug/main | wc -l) -gt 0 ] || [ CMakeLists.txt -nt debug/main ]; then echo 'need to build client';rm -rf build;mkdir -p build;cd build; cmake .. -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug && make -j32; else echo 'client is up to date'; fi
